original_text: The other nations will see that you are ashamed. All over the earth, people will hear you as you weep. As your soldiers run from the battle, they will fall over each other. They will fall to the ground together.’ King Nebuchadnezzar will attack Egypt The other nations will see that you are ashamed. All over the earth, people will hear you as you weep. As your soldiers run from the battle, they will fall over each other. They will fall to the ground together.’ King Nebuchadnezzar will attack Egypt The other nations will see that you are ashamed.
korean_text: 네 수치가 나라들에 들렸고 네 부르짖음은 땅에 가득하였나니 용사가 용사에게 걸려 넘어져 둘이 함께 엎드러졌음이라

sentences.original_text: The other nations will see that you are ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족들이 네가 부끄러워하는 것을 볼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: All over the earth, people will hear you as you weep.
sentences.korean_translation: 온 땅에서 사람들이 네가 우는 소리를 들을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: As your soldiers run from the battle,
they will fall over each other.
They will fall to the ground together.
The other nations will see that you are ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족들이 네가 부끄러워하는 것을 볼 것이다.
